tasks.task: Providing management advice for farmers in varying climate conditions
subtasks: Assess current El Niño or La Niña phase
Adjust planting timing based on expected moisture and temperature
Plan for more extreme weather due to climate change
Prepare for warmer and drier growing seasons in peanuts
Encourage increased irrigation capabilities and resistant/potent varieties
Implement water scheduling programs for dry conditions
Manage non-irrigated fields and monitor soil moisture
Control insects through crop rotation and proper planting times
Choose peanut varieties resilient to hot and dry conditions
Select varieties resistant or tolerant to aflatoxin
Detect and address diseases affecting peanut crops during drought
Rotate crops to prevent pest buildup, especially for soil pests
Avoid planting peanuts consecutively to reduce insect pressure

tasks.task: Providing management advice for farmers in varying climate conditions
subtasks: Assess current El Niño or La Niña phase
Adjust planting timing based on expected moisture and temperature (delay if El Niño, plant early if La Niña)
Plan for more extreme weather due to climate change
Prepare for potential warmer and drier growing seasons in peanuts
Choose peanut varieties that are resistant or tolerant to hot and dry conditions
Select varieties that are resistant or tolerant to aflatoxin

tasks.task: Implementing water scheduling programs in dry conditions
subtasks: Monitor soil moisture levels and adjust irrigation as needed
Schedule water use to meet plant needs

tasks.task: Managing non-irrigated fields under dry conditions
subtasks: Control insects through crop rotation
Monitor disease outbreaks and address them promptly

tasks.task: Practicing crop rotation to prevent pest buildup
subtasks: Rotate crops to disrupt pest life cycles
Avoid planting peanuts after other peanuts to reduce soil pests

subtasks: Use crop rotation to manage soil pests

Monitor soil moisture levels and schedule irrigation
Manage non-irrigated fields by controlling insects and diseases
